articles.title: 2 Weeks After Surgery, The Pope Is Back At St. Peter's Square - NPR
articles.description: The pope offered blessings for people affected by flooding in Western Europe, rioting in South Africa and protests in Cuba.
articles.content:
Pope Francis salutes the crowd as he arrives for the Angelus noon prayer from the window of his studio overlooking St. Peter's Square at the Vatican on Sunday.
Alessandra Tarantino/AP

articles.title: Keeper Mothwa the hero as Bafana win Cosafa Cup - SuperSport
articles.description: South Africa beat Senegal 5-4 on penalties (0-0 after extra-time) to win the 2021 Cosafa Cup tournament at Nelson Mandela Bay Stadium in Gqeberha on Sunday.
